mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) , PROGRESS_STATUS , TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS NOTICE_DATE FROM GY_LIGHT_REPAIR A GROUP BY PROGRESS_STATUS, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT A.REPAIR_NO , F_GY_DATA_CODE_NM('14', REPAIR_CD) AS LIGHT_GUBUN , A.REPAIR_CD , A.LIGHT_NO , A.NOTICE_NAME , A.PASSWORD , A.PHONE , A.MOBILE , COALESCE(CASE WHEN inform_method = '03' THEN PHONE WHEN inform_method = '01' THEN MOBILE ELSE COALESCE(COALESCE(MOBILE, PHONE), '') END, '') AS CONTACT , TO_CHAR(A.NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS NOTICE_DATE , COALESCE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.REPAIR_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY.MM.DD'), '') AS REPAIR_DATE , F_GY_DATA_CODE_NM('01', A.TROUBLE_CD) AS TROUBLE_NM , A.TROUBLE_CD , A.EMAIL , A.TROUBLE_DETAIL , A.PROGRESS_STATUS , F_GY_DATA_CODE_NM('03', A.PROGRESS_STATUS) AS PROGRESS_NAME , A.LOCATION , A.INFORM_METHOD , F_GY_DATA_CODE_NM('02', inform_method) AS INFORM_METHOD_NM FROM GY_LIGHT_REPAIR A LEFT OUTER JOIN GY_LIGHT_REPAIR_PART B ON A.REPAIR_NO = B.REPAIR_NO WHERE A.REPAIR_NO = #{repairNo} ORDER BY A.LIGHT_NO
SELECT PROGRESS_STATUS FROM GY_LIGHT_REPAIR A WHERE A.REPAIR_NO = #{repair_no} ORDER BY A.LIGHT_NO
SELECT CASE WHEN A.PASSWORD = #{password} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS "PW_CHK" FROM GY_LIGHT_REPAIR A WHERE A.REPAIR_NO = #{repairNo}
